import './App.css'; import React from "react" class App extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state={ firstName:"", LastName:"", age:"", gender:"", destination:"", dietaryRestrictions:{ isVegan:false, isKosher:false, isLactoseFree:false } } this.handleChange=this.handleChange.bind(this) } handleChange(event){ const{name,value}=event.target this.setState({ [name]:value }) } render(){ return(






Entered information:

your name:{this.state.firstname} {this.state.lastname}

your age:{this.state.age}

your gender:{this.state.gender}

your destination:{this.state.destination}

your dietry restrictions:

) } } export default App
